author: dain
msg: Fixed bug with isIdentical which caused a bean to be compared to itself
Registry id used for isIdentical was assuming that PK.toString was unique which isn't true for entity beans with a complex primary key

author: dain
msg: Throw an IllegalStateException if someone calls getEJBObject on a bean without a remote interface or getEJBLocalObject on a bean without a local interface

author: dain
msg: code arround OpenJPA bug with new-delete-new-find

msg: bug 5477: prevent Rule2XSBody info message from appearing on stderr during spamd startup
